title: React.js
description: React.js Library for building user interfaces. React makes it painless to create interactive UIs.

title: Javascript
description: Javascript is a lightweight, interpreted, or just-in-time compiled programming language with first-class functions.

title: HTML5
description: HTML5 is a markup language used for structuring and presenting content on the World Wide Web.

title: CSS
description: Cascading Style Sheets (CSS) is a stylesheet language used to describe the presentation of a document written in HTML or XML (including XML dialects such as SVG, MathML or XHTML).

title: Sass
description: Sass is a stylesheet language that's compiled to CSS. It allows you to use variables, nested rules, mixins, functions, and more, all with a fully CSS-compatible syntax.

title: Redux
description: Redux is a predictable state container for JavaScript apps. It helps you write applications that behave consistently, run in different environments (client, server, and native), and are easy to test.

title: Figma
description: Figma is a powerful web-based design tool that helps you create anything, websites, applications, logos, and much more.

title: Github
description: GitHub is a code hosting platform for version control and collaboration. It lets you and others work together on projects from anywhere.
